scenario.name: SuccessfullCall
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field2] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field2]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 15 Expires: 3600 User-Agent: Linphone/3.5.2 (QAP Tester) Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[field2] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[field2]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> [field1] Max-Forwards: 15 Expires: 3600 User-Agent: Linphone/3.5.2 (QAP Tester) Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[field3]@[field4] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: "LibonQA VTP" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] To: "LibonQA Absorber" <sip:[field3]@[field4]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Type: application/sdp Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, NOTIFY, MESSAGE, SUBSCRIBE, INFO Max-Forwards: 15 Supported: replaces,outbound User-Agent: Linphone/3.5.2 (QAP Tester) Subject: "Successful Call Test [field5]" P-Asserted-Identity: sip:[field5]@[field2] OnCallerOs: iPhone OnNetwork: Wifi Content-Length:[len]
v=0 o=[field0] 2100 2100 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=Talk c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 114 109 96 8 101 a=rtpmap:96 opus/48000/2 a=fmtp:96 mode=30 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-11

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: "LibonQA VTP" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] To: "LibonQA Absorber" <sip:[field3]@[field4]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] User-Agent: Linphone/3.5.2 (QAP Tester) P-Asserted-Identity: <sip:[field5]@[field2]> Max-Forwards: 15 Subject: "Successful Call Test" Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[field0]@[field2] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] From: "LibonQA VTP" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[call_number] To: "LibonQA Absorber" <sip:[field3]@[field4]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] User-Agent: Linphone/3.5.2 (QAP Tester) P-Asserted-Identity: sip:[field5]@[field2] Max-Forwards: 15 Subject: "Successful Call Test" Content-Length: 0
